captions.text: It feels so cold on my way to work today
Times that I have been running, looking ahead
Couldn't even go on vacation this summer
This is not the life I wanted
Makes me think of the past when I used to wear school uniforms
Never worried about what I should wear
Didn't forget about name tag
Combing her hair, the girl who used to dream
Back to those happy days (to those days)
I want to go back (want to go back)
Childish girl of clean face with no make up
Everyday I'm changing
I want to go back
I miss those happy days when I used to laugh so hard
I fell asleep in my mom's arms
My house used to be small but it was cozy
Actually it was not mine, just rented
But I miss my old town today of all days
My dad came back with red nose everyday
I waited for him everyday
I miss my dad who used to give me pocket money
Back to those happy days (to those days)
I want to go back (want to go back)
Childish girl of clean face with no make up
Everyday I'm changing
I want to go back
I miss those happy days when I used to laugh so hard
I want to be a time-traveller, even for a day
I want to smile, thinking back of the past
I thought I would be happy if I become an adult
Thought that I will be just like the main character of a drama
Now I think of those days when my heart fluttered
My first love that I liked so much
I miss the times when we used to walk together in our uniforms

comments.text:
Some of TIPs for watching this MV!

1.A messanger at first scene
Friend:Are you coming today,right?
I miss youㅠ
Everybody comes today~
JuB:Im sorry,but I cant go there maybe ㅠㅠ

2.Back to 2002
JuB is 30 years old in 2015,so JuB was really highschool student in 2002.

3.Nametag
'김은영(Kim eun young'is writed in both Nametags.
※Easter egg!If you see the nametag of adult JuB's,you can see "Sunhee 
Company"which is scene of 'Monday Blues'.

4.The Bus driver
Maybe he has a time-power or bus.
Ovious thing is he made 2 JuB's met.

5.Daddy's old papermoney
That bill is 'old version'.So we can note that time-travel is not a 
dream.(Because when JuB waked up,She still have that old papermoney!)﻿

comments.author: Cythia Forest

comments.text:
Usually I don't comment on kpop songs but this song is too good not to!! I 
have to admit I wasn't hooked at first when I heard this on the music shows 
but it really grew on me once I watched the MV and understood the lyrics. 

It's just so touching and relatable to anyone who is now an adult... to 
visit one's childhood again. So different from most other songs today, 
screaming angrily about girl power, craziness and bad relationships. (not I 
don't like 4Minute or Mad Clown!) 

Sunny Hill just got themselves a new fan! So gonna buy their album to 
support this underrated song! It deserves to be heard more!﻿
